faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about our AI Image Enhancer

items.title: What types of enhancements can I achieve?
items.description: Our AI can enhance colors, improve sharpness, adjust brightness and contrast, and remove noise effectively, making your photos more vibrant and appealing.

items.title: Is there a cost to use the enhancement feature?
items.description: Absolutely! Enjoy 30 free enhancements daily. Additional enhancements can be earned through participation in our community or upgraded plans available for frequent users.

items.title: Can I use enhanced images for my business?
items.description: Yes! If you subscribe, you can utilize enhanced images for commercial purposes. Free-tier users can enhance images for personal use only.

items.title: How is my privacy maintained during processing?
items.description: All enhancements are executed directly within your browser, meaning your photos never leave your device. We prioritize your privacy and data security.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and discover the transformation. No sign-up needed.
